actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the United States Housing Act of 1937 for the purpose of assuring energy savings with respect to rental units assisted under such Act.

summary.text: Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to restrict air-conditioning in rental units receiving financial assistance under such Act to individual air-conditioners sufficient to cool only a single room. Requires such air-conditioners to be metered and billed on an individual basis.

titles.title: A bill to amend the United States Housing Act of 1937 for the purpose of assuring energy savings with respect to rental units assisted under such Act.
